invoke despair.oracle_text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice. If they can't, they lose 2 life and you draw a card. Then repeat this process for an enchantment and a planeswalker.

opt.oracle_text:
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
Draw a card.

the eternal wanderer.oracle_text:
No more than one creature can attack The Eternal Wanderer each combat.
+1: Exile up to one target artifact or creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of that player's next end step.
0: Create a 2/2 white Samurai creature token with double strike.
−4: For each player, choose a creature that player controls. Each player sacrifices all creatures they control not chosen this way.

preacher of the schism.oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.
Whenever this creature attacks while you have the most life or are tied for most life, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

bladebrand.oracle_text:
Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Draw a card.

glorybringer.oracle_text:
Flying, haste
You may exert this creature as it attacks. When you do, it deals 4 damage to target non-Dragon creature an opponent controls. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

dream trawler.oracle_text:
Flying, lifelink
Whenever you draw a card, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever this creature attacks, draw a card.
Discard a card: This creature gains hexproof until end of turn. Tap it.

archfiend of ifnir.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cycle or discard another card, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature your opponents control.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cathartic reunion.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards.
Draw three cards.

fable of the mirror-breaker.type_line: Enchantment — Saga // Enchantment Creature — Goblin Shaman

teferi, hero of dominaria.oracle_text:
+1: Draw a card. At the beginning of the next end step, untap up to two lands.
−3: Put target nonland permanent into its owner's library third from the top.
−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you draw a card, exile target permanent an opponent controls."

soul warden.oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters, you gain 1 life.

sign in blood.oracle_text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

elderfang disciple.oracle_text: When this creature enters, each opponent discards a card.

yarok's fenlurker.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, each opponent exiles a card from their hand.
{2}{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

nissa's triumph.oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards. If you control a Nissa planeswalker, instead search your library for up to three land cards. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
